title: The mistresses of Charles II
itunes:title: The mistresses of Charles II
itunes:subtitle: Historian and author Linda Porter explores the lives of the many women who shared Charles II’s bed. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian and author Linda Porter talks about her new book Mistresses: Sex and Scandal at the court of Charles II, exploring the lives of the many women who shared the 17th-century monarch’s bed. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
